workflow.display-name: Create a Computer in an AD OU (by DN)
workflow.description:
Creates a new Computer object in the specified OU.
Prerequisite: vRO's AD plug-in must be configured with a Default server (AD:AdHost) by running the 'Configure Active Directory plug-in options' workflow.

param.name: ouDistinguishedName
param.description: The Distinguished Name (path) of the OU

param.name: newComputer
param.description: The new Computer object in AD

attrib.name: ou
attrib.description: OU object for the specified DN

workflow-item.name: item2
workflow-item.display-name: Create a computer in an organizational unit

bind.name: ou
bind.description: Parent organizational unit for the new computer

workflow-item.description: Creates an Active Directory computer in an organizational unit.

workflow-item.name: item3
workflow-item.script: System.log("Successfully created AD Computer object for '" + computerName + "'");
workflow-item.description: Log the input text to the console log with level 'log'

workflow-item.name: item1
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.thinkahead.activedirectory").getAdOuByDn(ouDistinguishedName) ;

bind.name: ouDistinguishedName
bind.description: The Distinguished Name (path) of the OU

workflow-item.description: Returns the AD:OrganizationalUnit object for the OU specified by its distinguished name (DN)

p-param.name: ouDistinguishedName
p-param.desc: The Distinguished Name (path) of the OU
